Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Step 31: SLO/SLI & Error Budgets (RG-6) â€” models/loader/budget/burn, alerts, CLI+API, gate, tests, docs

Implements comprehensive SLO/SLI framework with error budgets and burn rate monitoring:

Core Features:
- SLO models: targets, windows, thresholds (src/qnwis/slo/models.py)
- YAML loader with validation (src/qnwis/slo/loader.py)
- Error budget tracking: remaining %, minutes left (src/qnwis/slo/budget.py)
- Burn rate calculator: fast (5min) & slow (60min) windows (src/qnwis/slo/burn_rate.py)
- SLI snapshot: live metrics capture (src/qnwis/observability/metrics.py)

Alerting & Integration:
- Burn rate trigger in alert engine (src/qnwis/alerts/engine.py)
- Budget exhaustion rules (src/qnwis/alerts/rules.py)
- Notify integration (src/qnwis/agents/alert_center_notify.py)

CLI & API:
- qnwis-slo: validate, show, budget, burn (src/qnwis/cli/qnwis_slo.py)
- /api/slo endpoints: list, detail, budgets (src/qnwis/api/routers/slo.py)

Quality Assurance:
- RG-6 gate: 5/5 checks PASS (src/qnwis/scripts/qa/rg6_resilience_gate.py)
- Unit tests: 11 passed (tests/unit/slo/)
- Integration tests: 1 passed (tests/integration/slo/)
- SLO slice coverage script (src/qnwis/scripts/qa/step31_slo_slice.py)

Artifacts:
- docs/audit/rg6/rg6_report.json
- docs/audit/rg6/SLO_SUMMARY.md
- docs/audit/rg6/sli_snapshot.json
- docs/audit/badges/rg6_pass.svg
- docs/ops/step31_slo_error_budgets.md
- STEP31_SLO_IMPLEMENTATION_COMPLETE.md

Configuration:
- Added SLO examples in slo/ directory
- Updated CI/CD workflow for RG-6 validation
- Enhanced readiness gate with Step-31 tracking

EOF
